skill.name: 90's Kid
skill.description: By harnessing the power of Saturday morning cartoons, you lay the smack down on your enemies. Gnarly!

description.text: By harnessing the power of Saturday morning cartoons, you lay the smack down on your enemies. Gnarly!
You never saw the point in going to school... It didn't help that you locked yourself in the refridgerator to learn the arts of staying cool.
